channel.title: Vocalis Studio Blog
channel.description: Development blog for Vocalis Studio - updates, guides, and music production tips.

item.title: Complete Guide to Scale Types
item.description: Learn about all 9 scale patterns in Vocalis Studio. Find the right scale for your practice goals.

item.title: How to Use Key Progression Patterns
item.description: Make your scale practice more effective with key change settings. Learn about ascending/descending patterns and step intervals.

item.title: Streamline Practice with Presets
item.description: Learn how to save and manage your favorite scale settings as presets for quick access.

item.title: What You Can Do with Premium
item.description: A detailed look at Vocalis Studio Premium features. Understand the differences from the free version.

item.title: Tips for Better Recording Quality
item.description: Learn how to improve your recording environment and settings for more accurate pitch detection.

item.title: Understanding Cents
item.description: Learn what "cents" mean for measuring pitch deviation. A cent is 1/100th of a semitone.

item.title: What is Pitch?
item.description: Learn the basic concept of pitch that determines how high or low a sound is. Understand the relationship between frequency, note names, and MIDI numbers.

item.title: How to Read the Statistics
item.description: Learn how to interpret the statistics in the analysis screen. Understand pitch accuracy, vibrato, and spectrum analysis metrics.

item.title: What is a Spectrogram?
item.description: Learn the basics of reading a spectrogram. Understand how it visualizes the "color" of your voice.

item.title: How to Read the Pitch Graph
item.description: Learn how to interpret the pitch graph in the analysis screen. Visually track how your voice compares to the target notes.

item.title: Managing Your Recordings
item.description: Learn how to review, organize, and manage your voice recordings effectively.

item.title: Getting Started with Scale Practice
item.description: Learn how to use scale practice mode to train your pitch accuracy with guided reference tones.

item.title: Your First Recording
item.description: Learn how to make your first voice recording with Vocalis Studio in just a few simple steps.

item.title: Launching the Vocalis Studio Blog
item.description: We have launched the Vocalis Studio development blog. We will share app updates and helpful tips for music production.
